VARIABLES.name: y_A1
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether Product A1 is produced

VARIABLES.name: y_A2
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether Product A2 is produced

VARIABLES.name: y_A3
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether Product A3 is produced

OBJECTIVE.query: The specific part of extracted_queries used for objective
OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \max Z = \sum (p_{A1} \cdot x_{A1} + p_{A2} \cdot x_{A2} + p_{A3} \cdot x_{A3})

CONSTRAINTS.description: The total production of A1, A2, A3 does not exceed 1210 tons.
If the company decides to produce A1, then it must activate production the production lines at least 57 minutes to produce A1.
The minimum production batch constraint for A1 is 20 units per day.
The minimum production batch constraint for A2 is 20 units per day.
